attributes.action: get the police to prosecute polititcians for fraudulant claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown should get the police to prosecute crooked polititcians for making fraudulant claims and taking money from the taxpayers pockets.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
